house_listing.house_location: Box 519 Bosque County Rd. 1244 Kopperl, TEXAS 76652
house_listing.house_description: Retirement Bliss! Sit in the hottub gazebo or pool & watch the deer. This lovely home on 4.97 acres is on the edge of this quiet peaceful little town by Lake Whitney. Boatramps are close & also the Brazos is close. New tile, newer Berber carpet & other updates, fireplace, greenhouse, fenced, storage building.
